summary: This module aggregates metadata about the xformers library, including version, compiled C++ extensions, optional feature flags (such as open‑source mode, Triton support, and DCGM profiling), and the registry of available operators. It provides utilities to query the current feature configuration and to output a formatted summary of the library's capabilities.
business_intent: Enable developers and users to programmatically verify the build configuration and runtime capabilities of xformers, facilitating compatibility checks, debugging, and performance profiling in machine‑learning workflows.
